entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Markham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning then changing to periods of rain in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
